Package com.rambris

Class Summary
Config Handles configuration
Crypto Crypto functions are stored here
Database Database abstraction and support methods.
DatabasePool Database handling, but with a connection pool instead of getting a new connection every time.
DefinitionTable An adaption of Table that creates a definition table of key and values.
EnumerationIterator<I>  
Follower Java implementation of tail --follow
HTMLTable Generates HTML tables
Message Make sending emails easy.
Progress Calculates progress, ETA etc.
SimpleDatabase A simple implementation of Database that returns a real connection each time.
SimpleTextTable A TextTable that generate a more simple layout
Table Generate text representations of tabular data.
TextTable Generates a plain text layout of a table, much like the mysql command line client.
Util Static utility functions
